get.description: Get item availability information by Item Number and Store Number
Get item availability for the entire chain by item sku
Get availability horizon by department

post.description: Sets item availability information for a store based on an existing store

parameters.name: availabilityInitialization
parameters.description: Information for source and destination store

get.description: Get the definitions of the product hierarchies

404.description: Not found - No hierarchy definitions were found

get.description: Get the full hierarchy of the specified name.

parameters.name: hierarchyName
parameters.description: The name of the hierarchy to retrieve (e.g. Merchandising)

404.description: Not found - No hierarchy with the specified name was found

get.description: Get the full hierarchy of the specified name.

parameters.name: hierarchyName
parameters.description: The name of the hierarchy to retrieve (e.g. Merchandising)

parameters.name: levelOneId
parameters.description: Format - int32. The id of the first level of the hierarchy (e.g. Id of "Bakery" [the department])

404.description: Not found - No hierarchy with the specified name was found

get.description: Get the full hierarchy of the specified name.

parameters.name: hierarchyName
parameters.description: The name of the hierarchy to retrieve (e.g. Merchandising)

parameters.name: levelOneId
parameters.description: Format - int32. The id of the first level of the hierarchy (e.g. Id of "Bakery" [the department])

parameters.name: levelTwoId
parameters.description: Format - int32. The id of the second level of the hierarchy (e.g. Id of "WHITE BREADS" [the category])

404.description: Not found - No hierarchy with the specified name was found

get.description: Get the full hierarchy of the specified name.

parameters.name: hierarchyName
parameters.description: The name of the hierarchy to retrieve (e.g. Merchandising)

parameters.name: levelOneId
parameters.description: Format - int32. The id of the first level of the hierarchy (e.g. Id of "Bakeshop" [the department])

parameters.name: levelTwoId
parameters.description: Format - int32. The id of the second level of the hierarchy (e.g. Id of "WHITE BREADS" [the category])

parameters.name: levelThreeId
parameters.description: Format - int32. The id of the third level of the hierarchy (e.g. Id of "WEGMAN WHITE BREAD" [the class])

404.description: Not found - No hierarchy with the specified name was found

get.description: Moved Permanently - Get item location information
get.summary: Moved Permanently - Locations by SKU and Store

get.description: Moved Permanently - Get the locations for all stores for the given sku.

post.description: Moved Permanently - Gets item location for a list of skus
Moved Permanently - Saves a product location

delete.description: Moved Permanently - Creates a new product location

get.description: Get item information by Item Number

get.description: Moved Permanently - Get item alcohol information by Item Number

get.description:
Moved Permanently - Get food item information
Routes:
/products/food?barcode=<barcode>&hasCheckDigit=<hasCheckDigit>
get.summary: Moved Permanently - Food and Beverage by Barcode

parameters.name: barcode
parameters.description: Barcode for the item you are looking for

parameters.name: hasCheckDigit
parameters.description: Does the barcode provided contain a check digit

get.description:
Moved Permanently - Get alcohol item information
Routes:
/products/alcohol?barcode=<barcode>&hasCheckDigit=<hasCheckDigit>

parameters.name: barcode
parameters.description: Barcode for the item you are looking for

parameters.name: hasCheckDigit
parameters.description: Does the barcode provided contain a check digit

get.description:
Get item information
Routes:
/products?barcode=<barcode>&hasCheckDigit=<hasCheckDigit>
/products?plu=<plu>

parameters.name: barcode
parameters.description: Barcode for the item you are looking for

parameters.name: hasCheckDigit
parameters.description: Does the barcode provided contain a check digit

post.description: Add a new image URL for the product associated with the given SKU

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: Format - int32. SKU of product to add image to

delete.description: Remove the specified image URL from the product associated with the given SKU

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: Format - int32. SKU of product to remove image from

get.description: Moved Permanently - Search for a product given search criteria

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Format - int32. Number of results to return (default is 50)

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Format - int32. Page or results to return

get.description: Search for a trade identifier given search criteria

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Format - int32. Number of results to return (default is 50)

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Format - int32. Page or results to return

get.description: Moved Permanently - Get master list of locations within the store (e.g. "Produce")

post.description: Moved Permanently - Create or update a location within the given store

delete.description: Moved Permanently - Delete the location with the given name from the given store

get.description: Moved Permanently - Get item directions by Item Number
Moved Permanently - Get item marketing copy by Item Number

get.description: Moved Permanently - Get item warnings by Item Number
Get the full hierarchy of the specified name.

parameters.name: hierarchyName
parameters.description: The name of the hierarchy to retrieve (e.g. Merchandising)

parameters.name: levelIds
parameters.description: The ids of the levels of the hierarchy (e.g. Id of "Bakery" [the department] and Id of "WHITE BREADS" [the category] and Id of "WEGMAN WHITE BREAD" [the class])

404.description: Not found - No hierarchy with the specified name was found

get.description: Get item information without caching, for use when retrieving items that have been recently updated

IsAvailable.description: IsAvailable - true if item is available at store

InventoryAmount.description: Inventory quantity of the item at the store

Velocity.description: Sales velocity of the item at the store

LastSaleDate.description:
DateTime the item was last sold at the store
Unavailable data results in a null value

LastUpdatedDate.description: DateTime the record was last updated

ProductAvailability.description: Contains the availability for an item

IsChainAvailable.description:
True if the product is available somewhere within the chain.
Otherwise, false.

Velocity.description: Sales velocity of the item across the chain

SourceStore.description: Source Store Number for Availability Data

DestinationStore.description: Destination Store Number for Availability Data

HierarchyDefinition.description: Represents the definition of a product hierarchy (e.g. Merchandising)

HierarchyLevelDefinition.description: Represents the definition of a product hierarchy level (e.g. Department/Category/Class for Merchandising)

LevelRank.description: The level's rank in the hierarchy (1 to n where n is the deepest level of the hierarchy)

IHierarchyNode.description: Interface for a node in a product hierarchy

ParentId.description: Parent hierarchy ID which we do not want to expose

LocationSort.description:
Store Location Sort Order (aka Walking Path)
Unavailable data results in a null value

NumericSizeUOM.description: The Unit of Measure for the package's numeric size

AvailableFromVendorDate.description: Datetime when the product is available from the vendor.

CountryOfOrigin.description: The country from which the product originates.

FirstShipDate.description: The date when the product was first shipped.

HandlingInstructionsCode.description: A code identifying the handling instructions.

HasDisplayReadyPackaging.description: Indicates if the product has packaging ready for display.

InformationProviderGlobalLocationNumber.description: The information provider global location number.

IsItemDisplayUnit.description: Indicated if a product is a display unit.

IsPriceOnPack.description: Indicates if the price is printed on the packaging of the product.

InformationProviderName.description: The name of the information provider.

StorageInstructions.description: Instruction on how to store the product.

UsageInstructions.description: Instructions on how to use the product. OBSOLETE.

CreatedBy.description: Creator of product in Wegmans' system.

CreatedDateTime.description: Date time when product was added to Wegmans system.

UpdatedBy.description: Name of the last entity to update the product.

UpdatedDateTime.description: Date time of the last product update.

ReplenishmentType.description: A quasi-key indicating the item replenishment type.  Ex.) 10 - WAREHOUSE

IsBigPack.description: Indicates if item is a "Big Pack"

IsRawMaterial.description: Indicates if item is a raw ingredient

PointOfSaleDescription.description: The item description used at point of sale.

WegmansPack.description: Wegmans defined package amount; please use StoreReplenishmentQuantity or AverageCaseWeight

ReplenishmentInMultiplesOf.description: Multiple to be applied to replenishment quantity

TradeIdentifierConfigurations.description: List of the Trade Identifier Configurations

EcommerceEnabled.description: Flag for whether Ecommerce has been enabled

SellByUnit.description: The textual description of how items are sold when they are sold as a group

ItemTags.description: The collection of Tags for an item

SoldByUOM.description: Description of how an item is sold when the item is sold by a Unit of Measurement

ConsumerBrand.description: The Brand Description used for Marketing

ConsumerSubBrand.description: The Sub Brand Description used for Marketing

AuthorizedCatalogDepartment.description: Specifies how items are grouped together on certain store orders.

IsReducedDelivery.description: Grouping of slow moving items into a different ordering schedule within grocery

Merchant.description: Used in OMS to group and sort store orders for the purposes of inventory allocation and forced distributions

DiscontinueInfo.description: Object that holds the reasons and dates for a product being discontinued

TradeIdentifierConfiguration.description: Represents a Trade Identifier Configuration (aka. Hierarchy)

AgeVerification.description: Age used for minimum age verification

IsWIC.description: WIC - Women, Infants, and Children program

IsFoodStampable.description: Food stamps can be used for this item

IsFrontEndScalable.description: Can we weighed at the front end

ItemTags.description: Tags of an item that note which defined properties or tags belongs to an item

IsFamilyPack.description: Is the item part of a Family Pack

IsFreshCutVegetables.description: Is the item fresh cut vegetables

IsFoodYouFeelGoodAbout.description: Is the item part of Food You Feel Good About

IsPrivateLabel.description: Is the item part of a private label

IsReadyToCook.description: Is the item ready to cook

IsWegmansBrand.description: Is the item a Wegmans-branded item

DiscontinueDate.description: Date time when the product was discontinued

SuspendStartDate.description: Date time when the product was suspended

SuspendEndDate.description: Date time when the product was no longer suspended

ChildQuantity.description: THe quantity of child trade identifiers

Depth.description: Physical dimension of the depth of item

DepthUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure of the depth

Height.description: Physical dimension of the height of item

HeightUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure of the height

HierarchyOrder.description: Indicates the level in trade identifier hierachy.  Ex) Pallet = 1, Case = 2, InnerPack = 3

IsConsumable.description: Indicates if the item can be sold on shelves.

IsOrderable.description: Indicates if the trade item is orderable.

TradeItemsInACompleteLayerQuantity.description: The number of items in a layer.

TradeItemUnitDescriptor.description: Trade Item Unit Descriptor. Ex) Pallet, Each, Case.

Weight.description: Physical dimension of the weight of item

WeightUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure of the weight

Width.description: Physical dimension of the width of item

WidthUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure of the width

Dimension.description: The physical dimensions of the trade identifier

ClaimType.description: A code depicting the degree to which a trade item contains a specific nutrient or ingredient in relation to a health claim

Description.description: Free text field for any additional nutritional claims

Diet.description:
Information on whether the product meets the criteria to be classified 
as suitable for a specific targeted group. Certain groups of consumers 
are limited in consuming products, depending on the ingredients or 
preparation style. This can be i.e. due to religious reasons or 
restriction of diet reasons

DietTypeCode.description: Code indicating the diet the product is suitable for

DietTypeDescription.description: Free text for indication of diet not stated in the list of diets

DietCertification.description: A certification associated with a specific diet

FoodAdditive.description:
Information on presence or absence of additives 
or genetic modifications contained in the product

Name.description:
The name of any additive or genetic modification 
contained or not contained in the product

ContainmentLevel.description: Code indicating the level of presence of the additive

FoodAllergen.description:
Description of the presence or absence of allergens as governed 
by local rules and regulations, specified per allergen

TypeCode.description: Code indicating the type of allergen

ContainmentLevelCode.description: Code indicating the level of presence of the additive

AllergenStatement.description: Description of the presence or absence of allergens as governed by local rules and regulations

Ingredients.description:
Information on the constituent ingredient make up of the product
Ingredients may have multiple lines

Statement.description: Gets or sets a line of ingredients

Indications.description:
Information on the purpose and usage of a drug
Indications may have multiple lines

Statement.description: Gets or sets a line of indications

NutrientType.description: Code from the list of the INFOODS food component tag names

QuantityContained.description: Measurement value indicating the amount of nutrient contained in the product. Is expressed relative to the serving size.  Allows for the representation of the same value in different units of measure but not multiple values

NutrientQuantity.description: Gets or sets the nutrient quantity

NutrientUOM.description: Gets or sets the nutrient unit of measure

MeasurementPrecision.description: Code indicating whether the specified nutrient content is exact or approximate

DailyValueIntakePercent.description:
The percentage of the recommended daily intake of a nutrient as 
recommended by authorities of the target market. Is expressed 
relative to the serving size and base daily value intake

DailyValueIntakeReference.description:
Free text field specifying the daily value intake base for on 
which the daily value intake per nutrient has been based.

ItemQuantity.description: Gets or sets the item quantity

ItemUOM.description: Gets or sets the unit of measure
